comments:
Build: I20060822-0800

Using this build, you get an NPE whenever opening a custom perspective (one that has been saved with non-default view configuration and layout).  This causes the workbench layout to be lost on startup, and subsequent attempts to open a custom layout also fail.

Moving to RC1 and marking as WORKSFORME since I can't repro this...John?
Nope, haven't seen the problem since that build. Note, I don't think you need to set a target milestone for bugs marked WORKSFORME.

Just didn't want it to disappear from my radar until I got your feedback...;-)

Thanks
